评论概述: A Very Nice Suit, but May Need Some Tailoring
评论详情: The pants and the jacket are nice to wear. The jacket is a little big and I want it taken in a little bit, but the pants fit great for me and everything is comfortable. I'm not going to wear this combo to my office for a regular day again, but I would wear this to a lighter work function or a night out for drinks. Both parts work well separately too.

Very nice good quality suit.  Doesn't look cheap and has a great fit.  It's comfortable as well.  I will say, I'm a little bigger up top and the jacket doesn't close as I would like it to; however, a bigger size would be too big.  Overall it's no big deal to wear it slightly opened.  I really like it.

This will be mainly a suit for meetings or interviews. The shoulder pads are noticeable while wearing the jacket. This doesn't bother me, but fashion is subjective. The outfit does seem to fit as described. I would not wear anything thicker than a light blouse under the jacket or it may fit snug. The pants do fit at the waist, but seem looser in the legs - the suit is a nice, complete jacket and pants set. There is a pretty pleat in the front pant legs which I may have to keep up with by ironing on a very, very low setting. I chose the navy blue which is very dark. The company states this suit may be washed or dry cleaned gently and I would only hang it to dry it. Overall, this suit set seems good, but the style might seem to suit a more mature shopper. I may order one in a different color.

评论概述: A suit from Amazon?!.....That actually fits?!
评论详情: Ok, seriously I ordered this suit on a whim, not expecting much. In fact, I expected it to be totally horrible...boy was I wrong! The material of this suit is actually really nice and looks like the same material as some of my dress pants. The pants have a stretchy section in the back but a flat front that will suit any business attire. The jacket fit well to my surprise (36D up top) and buttoned in the middle just fine without looking like I borrowed my grandmas suit. This suit actually surprised me a lot, and I'm so glad I gave it a try. It's a total bargain at this price and I usually pay four times as much for a suit of this kind. Now I just need to decide which color to get next....highly recommend!

Got the size XS for my daughter who wears a petite 0-2 and usually fits an XS-S. The jacket fits her well but is longer on her than the model's of its Amazon product photos. She likes it's coverage and its smart-professional fit that can also be worn in more casual social settings like cafe & restaurant dates with her friends. She wears the jacket by itself with black pants. The matching Teal pants with her jacket is too long on her and fits her too loosely. The only part that fits her well is the waist area. Everything below that is too loose for her style preference. Good quality material and sewing. She likes the satiny feel of the inside of the jacket and its more matte look & feel of the outside.  Recommended.
THIS SUIT IS NICELY MADE  THE MATERIAL IS SOFT TO THE TOUCH ONLY IT RUNS A LITTLE SMALL AROUND THE HIPS AND WAIST SO ORDER A  SIZE UP SHOULD HAVE  GOT A 3X

This suit is high end and fits as expected. The groin area is a bit longer than I would like which makes it slightly unflattering. However, it is pictured that way as well so I wouldn’t say that’s a surprise. This suit is great professional/business wear for someone in management or corporate. If you like a straight leg with minimal tightness, this is it. It’s very comfortable. I am 5’6” and weigh 115lbs. The small fits me with room but could be a little bit longer in my opinion.

评论概述: Quality material, sized as advertised, looks great while remaining comfortable.
评论详情: My wife chose this for herself and loves it, she said that the material is very soft, has some stretch, and is very, very comfortable. Seems to be good quality in both the material and the stitching. She also said that it fitted exactly as expected. It looks really good for the days when there are back-to-back meetings, and doesn't show creasing as much as some of her other suits
